name: Roots of All Evil (Jovian Games)
description:
A simple, quick 2D platformer arcade game made for the 2023 Global Game Jam! Shoot the bad guys, maximize your score!

CONTROLS

WASD - Move

F - Melee Attack

Space - Ranged Attack

Q - Special Attack

CREDITS

Layna Stambaugh - Programming, level design, and animation.

Dane Studebaker - Art design, character design.
